title: U.S. Remains a Dangerous Place for Unvaccinated
itunes:title: U.S. Remains a Dangerous Place for Unvaccinated
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses seeing deaths and hospitalizations from Covid-19 on the rise. Bloomberg Businessweek Features Writer Ashlee Vance shares his Businessweek Magazine story The Future of Space Is Bigger Than Bezos, Branson or Musk. Bloomberg News Higher Education Finance Reporter Janet Lorin explains how scarce flights and visa issues are hampering international students' plans to reach the U.S. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Lancz, Research Director at LanczGlobal.com

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
